quiz.question: Which phobia is the fear of hair or touching hair sometimes found in grooming avoidance?
Which phobia's clinical status remains debated but shows measurable discomfort in lab images?
Alektorophobia is a fear of what animal?
Which phobia term indicates fear of crossing thresholds or doorways in transit?
Which phobia was highlighted in surveys as a common modern anxiety about losing digital connectivity?
Omphalophobia describes fear of what body part?
Which term describes fear specifically tied to clowns in entertainment contexts?
Which phobia name literally means fear of red and has historical symbolic associations?
Which unusual phobia name originates from a 1980s cartoon as a joke about ducks?
Which rare phobia name derives from Greek roots meaning 'peanut' and 'butter' combined?
Which phobia name humorously denotes fear of long words?
Which phobia describes fear of being without internet access or phone signal?
Which phobia has been examined via neuroimaging to compare fear circuitry activation?
